name: The letter delivered at the edge of collapse
name_original: The letter delivered at the edge of collapse
description:
The world is on the edge of collapse ! You have to deliver a very important letter to the king ! He is the boss and only he is capable to stop the apocalypse ! You have 60 seconds to succeed in your mission. Will you be able to save the world ?

This game was posted for the 2021 VimJam in September and was the second ever game jam that I took part in. Each participant had 10 days to create a game that fitted the theme "On the edge" and the restriction "Boss". In my game the world is on the edge of collapse and the player has to deliver a letter to the king (i.e. the boss of the lands) to save the world.

All art & audio created by me during the jam.

If you enjoyed this game, please send in a comment. Reading feedback and your experiences seriously brings me a lot of happiness.

Here are some of the biggest lessons I've learnt during this jam :

  • Desining levels for a platformer is amusing
  • Creating assets (both auditive and visual) is a lot of fun, even if it looks very amateur. Here's the link to the beepbox song. 
  • Paint dot net's noise function really gives a lot of depth to images
  • It is important to fix a resolution before starting the project, otherwise you get unpleasant results (such as my first game jam entry)
  • Being able to conceive games and getting inspiration from everywhere is a really pleasant feeling.
